title: Cloud Video Intelligence API - Streaming video annotation
abstract:
# Cloud Video Intelligence API - Streaming video annotation
**    Beta     ** This feature is subject to the "Pre-GA Offerings Terms" in the General Service Terms section   of the [Service Specific Terms](/terms/service-terms#1) .     Pre-GA features are available "as is" and might have limited support.    For more information, see the [launch stage descriptions](/products#product-launch-stages) .
You can use a [Vertex AI AutoML](/vertex-ai/docs/beginner/beginners-guide) model for the following features:
- [Action recognition](/video-intelligence/docs/streaming/action-recognition) .
- [Video classification](/video-intelligence/docs/streaming/video-classification) .
- [Object tracking](/video-intelligence/docs/streaming/automl-object-tracking)
